    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessController

        public ChessController(ChessLogic model,
               ChessView view,
               ChessBoard board,
               ScoreBoard scoreBoard,
               NewGameDialog newGameDialog,
               HighScoreDialog highScoreDialog)
        Constructor for ChessController, the controller.

        Connects observers to observable and adds this as a listener to all objects with action events.

        Parameters:
        model - The Chess Model
        view - The Chess view
        board - The Chess Board
        scoreBoard - The Chess score board
        newGameDialog - The dialog for starting a new game
        highScoreDialog - The dialog for displaying highscore
